subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The threetime Tour de France champion Alberto Contador challenged cycling authorities to freeze his urine and blood samples until technology can show he rode clean in this year’s race, disproving his positive test for a banned substance.
snippet: The threetime Tour de France champion Alberto Contador challenged cycling authorities to freeze his urine and blood samples until technology can show he rode clean in this year’s race, disproving his positive test for a banned substance.
